item.description: Summary of the Zoomania Path project

item.title: Waterfall Fountain
item.description: A soothing waterfall perfect for wetlands or tropical rainforest areas in your zoos.

item.title: South American Trashcan
item.description: We made this trashcan a while ago. We hope that you all enjoy it.

item.title: Mystery Meat Trough
item.description: A trough with green meat in it.

item.title: Mystery Meat Dish
item.description: A dish with the green meat inside.

item.title: Mini Trashcan Pack
item.description: In this pack, you will find a Royal Trascan, Marble Trashcan, and a Wooden Trashcan.

item.title: Mahogany Bench
item.description: A dark wooden bench great for any rest stop or viewing area.

item.title: Lighthouse
item.description: The Lighthouse was made from the Lighthouse Gazebo.

item.title: Large Safari Fountain
item.description: This is a large version of the savannah themed fountain

item.title: Yellow Mongoose
item.description: An African mongoose. Its main biome is scrub. Will not dig under chain link fences!

item.title: Waterbuck
item.description: Here’s a waterbuck for your zoo.

item.title: Wallaroo
item.description: It is one star, main biome is scrub, but it also likes alpine.

item.title: Spanish Broom Hare
item.description: A plant and animal both from northern Spain.

item.title: Narrow-Striped Mongoose
item.description: A bushy-tailed mongoose from the dry forests of Madagascar.

item.title: Pygmy Goat
item.description: The Pygmy Goat is a grassland animal that all of the guests love.

item.title: Nutria
item.description: A large rodent!

item.title: Zoo Tycoon 1 Install Guide
item.description: Depending on the version of Zoo Tycoon 1 you own, the mod install directory might be different. The type of file you want to install might be important as well. Try these out and see which works for you. Table of Contents Important Installing Entity Mods Lang Files Installing Zoos Installing Scenarios Questions? Important Turn off the game: Though it shouldn’t cause any issues if we were to install a mod while your game is running, it makes sense to have it shut down so that any changes show up on a re-launch.

item.title: Zoo Tycoon 2 Install Guide
item.description: Depending on the version of Zoo Tycoon 2 you own, the mod install directory might be different. The type of file you want to install might be important as well. Try these out and see which works for you. Table of Contents Important Method 1 Method 2 Step 1 Step 2 Step 3 Installing Zoos and Maps Questions? Important Turn off the game: Though it shouldn’t cause any issues if we were to install a mod while your game is running, it makes sense to have it shut down so that any changes show up on a re-launch.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or simply want to get in touch. Please read ahead as I have a few emails set up for separate occasions. Table of Contents Submitting a new file File Policies Bug Reports Other queries Submitting a new file Want to submit a new file to ZooBerry? Email me at submit@goosifer.io Please make sure to include the following in your email:

item.title: Disclaimer
item.description: Disclaimer ZooBerry is a fan-made platform dedicated to hosting user-created modifications (“mods”) for Zoo Tycoon, a video game developed and owned by Microsoft Corporation. We would like to emphasize that this website is not affiliated with or endorsed by Microsoft in any way. Zoo Tycoon and all related trademarks, logos, characters, and other assets are the property of Microsoft Corporation. The mods hosted on this website are created by the Zoo Tycoon community and are provided for informational and entertainment purposes only.

item.title: Licenses and Credits
item.description: Credits Thank you Jay and Fern Special thanks to Jay and Fern from the Zoo Tycoon Community Download Directory for their advice and great tips while I was getting my thoughts sorted about ZooBerry, and for all of their great work around the community in general! Thank you MJ, Lgcfm, and NanoLancensis Big thanks to MJ, Lgcfm, and NanoLancensis over on the Zoo Tycoon Discord for helping ‘rediscover’ some of our lost ZooMania files.

item.title: Links
item.description: ZooBerry itself does not endorse a specific Zoo Tycoon community nor does it run one of its own. However, there are many options that you are welcome to check out. These are also a good resource if you have questions about Zoo Tycoon mods or how to make your own. Table of Contents For Community Zoo Tek Phoenix The ZT2 Roundtable The r/ZooTycoon Subreddit For more mods not hosted on ZooBerry Learn how to create Zoo Tycoon mods For Community Zoo Tek Phoenix The longest-running Zoo Tycoon forum, Zoo Tek Phoenix sports one of the nicest communities out there and are always keen on helping if you get stuck.

item.title: On Licenses
item.description: Every file on ZooBerry contains a license field. If no license is disclosed, you can assume the file is a closed work and not available for derivation or redistribution. Many authors do choose to release their work under an open source license, even one as open as public domain. If you’re an author and wish to find out more about what license you might pick to submit to ZooBerry, please read ahead.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to ZooBerry Table of Contents Welcome to ZooBerry Hi, Welcome. ZooBerry Will you backup legacy mods from other forums not from ZooMania, Northern Skies, or Artifex? What about new mods released today? Mod ownership Community Hi, Welcome. My name is Goosifer, but I used to go by other usernames. A long time ago I used to help run a couple of Zoo Tycoon websites named ZooMania and Northern Skies. I was also lucky to join a modding team named Artifex toward the very end of my time in the scene.

item.title: Search
item.description: Search guide Use * asterisks before or after words to expand results. Do not use the asterisks if looking for exact words. Say we want to find anything with the word Ginger Simply search Ginger without asterisk if looking for Ginger Ging* will find Ginger or other words that start with Ging Ginger* won’t work. If you’re looking for Gingerella though, well, knock yourself out :P ZooBerry is a statically-generated website, which means performing a site search on Google.

item.description: Here’s a colorful wolf that eats almost anything.

item.title: Fringe Eared Oryx
item.description: The Fringe-Eared Oryx is a scrub dwelling antelope. It is a subspecies of gemsbok native to southern Africa.

item.description: The Largest Species of Antelope - Now Available to Adopt in Your Zoo! Comes with 3 Variant Skins!

item.description: Use the gingerbread wall to spice up your holiday zoos and to create fun areas in your zoos.

item.description: This is the an all glass fence created by Gibbon-Fanatic with help from Penguinman. Enjoy!

item.description: The Goral is an Asian Antelope

item.description: This is a large version of the kelp forest available in MM2.

item.description: This is a North American weasel for ZT2. It contains 2 variants (not shown) - white and brown with light facial markings.

item.description: The Mexican Wolf is a sub-species of the Gray Wolf.
